item.title: Adding sound [508] No credits to me
item.dc:creator: @fighter_aid fighter aid
item.description:
@fighter_aid wrote:

Here are the methods.

Credits to Noobscape.

Credits to 0wned_pl0x

Here is Guide

public void playGlobalSound(int soundId, int j, int delay) { for (Player p : Engine.players) { if(p == null || p.stream == null || p.disconnected[0]){ continue; } p.stream.createFrame(119); p.stream.writeWord(soundId); p.stream.writeByte(j); p.stream.writeWord(delay); } }

public void playSoundInArea(int playX, int playY, int distance, int soundId, int j, int delay) { for (Player p : Engine.players) { if(p == null || p.stream == null || p.disconnected[0]){ continue; } if(Misc.getDistance(playX, playY, p.absX, p.absY) <= distance) { p.stream.createFrame(119); p.stream.writeWord(soundId); p.stream.writeByte(j); p.stream.writeWord(delay); } } }

public void playSound(Player p, int soundId, int j, int delay) { if(p == null || p.stream == null || p.disconnected[0]){ return; } p.stream.createFrame(119); p.stream.writeWord(soundId); p.stream.writeByte(j); p.stream.writeWord(delay); }

Usage:

playSound(p, SOUND#,  1, Delay#);
playGlobalSound(Sound#, 1, Delay#);
playSoundInArea(CoordX, CoordY, Distance, Sound#, 1, Delay#);

Enjoy.

Once again - No credits to me for this one.

Have Fun lolz.

Permission:

MSN

[RS]NoobScape[RS] says:
…
ok ,if you want to , i gave a lot of people permission
You didn’t need 2 ask lolz.

Other Permission i dont have yet SOZ

Read full topic
